title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon said Trump's proposed 10% cap on credit card rates would be an 'economic disaster'
full_text:
JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon said Trump's proposed 10% cap on credit card rates would be an 'economic disaster'. Dimon warned at Davos that Trump's credit card interest rate cap could harm 80% of Americans.. Dimon said at Davos that the cap would cause a "disaster."Denis Balibouse/Reuters
  • Jamie Dimon said Trump's proposed cap on credit card interest rates could hurt 80% of Americans.
